title: Watch Esports logout loop
body:
So i've been TRYING to do the crappy "Ryze-ing Champions" quest, but it's stuck on the good old logout/log in loop (which unshockingly, hasn't been fixed).
What happens is

>Log in to watch esport (the link given in the quest)
>Loads
>Auto logs out
>Redirects to watch esports
>Logs back in
>Redirects to watch esports
>Loads
>Auto logs out
>Redirects to watch esports
>Logs back in
>Redirects to watch esports
>Loads
>Auto logs out
>Redirects to watch esports
>Logs back in
>Redirects to watch esports
>Loads
>Auto logs out
>Redirects to watch esports
>Logs back in
>Redirects to watch esports
>Loads
>Auto logs out
>Redirects to watch esports
*Repeat infinitely*

See the pattern?

replies.body: Can't say I've heard of that one. Have you tried a diff browser?

Has happened on Chrome, Brave and Firefox.
The only difference between the 3 is the redirection rates. Brave being the fastest of the 3.

Do you have the same issue on different accounts, or is it just one that's affected? Have you tried on a diff PC at all? Or mobile even?

I have no idea what could cause such a thing, so support is your best bet, but if it's happening a lot narrowing down when it happens would be helpful, and possibly finding a workaround in the meantime certainly doesn't hurt.

Only got the one account, too lazy to do others. 
Tried on 2 other PCs, got the same result. 

It's been happening since the Watch missions started.

If it's happening on multiple PCs with the same account sounds like it might be an account-specific thing, though not sure what would cause it still. Other than asking support the best possibility I could offer would be to try on mobile.
I have been having the exact same issue.
